notes:
Wood volume of the stem without bark or stump at least 7 cm in diameter (limit of coarse wood) of all trees and shrubs  starting at 12 cm dbh, based on the stem-form functions according to Kaufmann (2001). The definition of the assortment is based on the 2000 edition of the Trading Practices (Handelsgebräuchen Ausgabe 2000 ).
